SELECT work_num AS workNum , name_ch AS nameCh , salesman_type AS salesmanType , two_level_department AS twoLevelDepartment , three_level_department AS threeLevelDepartment , organization , station AS station FROM salesman WHERE three_level_department =#{country}
select area as area,execute_company as country from performance_count group by area,execute_company HAVING area IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT(DATE_FORMAT(start_time,"%Y年%m月")) FROM performance_count ORDER BY start_time ASC
